title: JSU Bakhmut Directio Rusian of the Army Shelled Mykolaivka, Vasyukivka, Bogdanivka, times of Yar, Ivanivske, Neo York of Donetsk Reggi ...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Mykolayivka, Vasukivka, Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Druzhba of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
